name: The party's first glimpse of Abyssos Prime
prompt: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, consistent painterly collection style, Atmospheric scene: The party's first glimpse of Abyssos Prime, clear narrative focal point, atmospheric VFX support, cinematic light shaping, high-fidelity illustration, aquatic fantasy realism, subsurface caustics, bioluminescent accents, pressure-dome materials, cinematic atmosphere, palette: teals, deep blues, sea-greens, pearl highlights, Use specified aspect/resolution; avoid artifacts., Avoid readable signage or paragraphs; use iconography or blank signboards. No embedded words., Avoid garbled or random letter strings; keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins., Avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare.
alt_text: Atmospheric illustration of: The party's first glimpse of Abyssos Prime.
revised_prompt: Your adventure party's maiden view of the splendid Abyssos Prime in a fantastical tabletop setting akin to D&D 5e. Explore the enthralling abyss, embellished with terrestrial medieval-fantasy materials and harmonious attire. The highlight is a majestic, theatrical scene charged with a unique atmosphere: Subaquatic realism blends perfectly with mesmeric subsurface caustics whilst bioluminescent accents add depth and allure. This high-fidelity illustration is devoid of any modern technology. Dive into the cinematic light shaping where the narrative focal point is untouched by any extraneous features - no readable signs or paragraphs, no garbled text, and certainly no sci-fi or contemporary elements. The scene is shaped by a soothing palette of teals, deep blues, sea-greens, and pearl highlights. Make sure the scene is consistent with a painterly collection style, and the quality of the image is high by avoiding any artifacts. Keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins, adding a tangible depth to your exploration.
